item.title: Centos7下通过kubeadm安装kubernetes-v1.14.2
item.description: 添加hosts文件 echo "10.40.0.201 hiningmeng-k8s1 10.40.0.202 hiningmeng-k8s2 10.40.0.203 hiningmeng-k8s3 10.40.0.204 hiningmeng-k8s4 " >> /etc/hosts 关闭防火墙、selinux sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config setenforce 0 systemctl disable firewalld.service systemctl stop firewalld.service 配置net.bridge modprobe br_netfilter echo "net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-ip6tables = 1 net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables = 1" >> /etc/sysctl.conf sysctl
